text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa…… T-time…… Aww, it's no different from before……!
choice_data_list: Let's take a break. Do you remember what I said?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah, um…… that I'm too anxious and rushing things, right? I'm pushing myself too much and ruining my form.
choice_data_list: Yeah. For now, don't worry about time
Yeah. For now, don't worry about time

text_block_list.text: For now, I wanted her to run calmly without rushing. Mentally and physically, I wanted to reduce the load on her training――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: So I can remember my form from before my injury…… Right? I-I'll do my best……!
choice_data_list: Let's not rush and build up gradually!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah!
The current Zenno Rob Roy couldn't really assess her own abilities. For now, if she could just start believing in herself……!
A few days later――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (For some reason, my body feels light……? Even though lately, I've just been running however I felt like……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (……yeah, that's right. It's fine not to rush. Trainer-san believes in my strength after all.)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (That's why, me too…… I need to believe in myself at least as much as Trainer-san does……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I'm fine……!
……A few days before the Sports Festival, in the library. Zenno Rob Roy was reviewing material related to the 『Hero Search』.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……There's no mistaking it. Trainer-san said she wasn't but…… as I thought, Kris S-san is our Hero.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: At this time, on this course, on that date. No matter how you look at this data, there's only Kris S-san……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……This information…… I don't…… want to tell them……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (But, I have to. At the Sports Festival, I'll compete against Kris S-san and lose…… and then I'll tell them everything and put this to an end.)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (That's why, until then……)
And so, the day of the Sports Festival arrived! Zenno Rob Roy was――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (N-no way! No way……! Why today, of all days, did I have a late start……!?)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Kris S-san's back, is getting further and further away…… at this rate, I won't even be able to see it anymore)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (…… As I thought, I can't win. There was no way I could win. Even with all that training we did……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
choice_data_list: You're the main character, Rob Roy!!
You're the main character, Rob Roy!!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (I…… I'm the main character?)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (If I do win against Kris S-san, what will happen? Will my story start then? If it does――)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Even after the Sports Festival, and after we find our hero. Will Trainer-san still want to see the story of me being the main character?)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (I want them to……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ha――aaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: What's this, Zenno Rob Roy starts to pull forward here! But in the final straight, Symboli Kris S is still far ahead!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Watch me, Trainer-san. As the only reader of my Heroic Tale……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: The main character…… is me!! Taaaaaaaaーーーー!!
I finally realized. It was a strong, wild, and desperate run. But filled with pride―― just like the Hero I saw that day!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa…… haaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――So you've made it this far.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Symboli Kris S accelerates tremendously before the goal! Faster, and faster! As expected, today's main character is none other than her!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: And now she crosses first! Symboli Kris S wins handily!!
There was a thunderous applause and cheering coming from the spectators. Of course―― it was intended for the victor.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (…… I lost…… I thought so. Things wouldn't be that easy. That's why I need to say it. I need to give up on that.)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer-san! Um, I know who that Hero―

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: You were―― huh?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh? W-what do you mean by that!? Why are you bring that up all of a sudden……!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Rob Roy, about that race―― oh, are you preoccupied?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah, Kris S-san! You came at just the right time, there's something I want to ask you……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ――And so, on this day at around 4PM! You were using the outside turf course, right……!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――Yes.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: With you―― we were practicing together. About the time―― I'm not sure――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: S-see!? I saw it with my own eyes too! There's no mistaking that the Hero was Kris S-san!
choice_data_list: Hold on, if you were practicing together……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――Rob Roy was there too.
choice_data_list: Did you have your hair tied back?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… I think so.
choice_data_list: And you almost tripped and fell?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: How come you even saw that!? So then…… then that means…… eeeh!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……Eeeeeeh!?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: ――I see, so you ARE preoccupied.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I see. After that I was injured so I couldn't run much, and you couldn't tell that that Hero was me……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……that's surprising. So from the start you…… were watching me then.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……I said it before, right? A heroic tale becomes a heroic tale when it starts being told as a hero's story.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That's why, Trainer-san! I'll do my best. From now on, I'll make sure you're the one that wants to tell this story.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Together, we'll finish this story. 『The Heroic Tale of Zenno Rob Roy』 ……!
She was smiling as she said that. And that was the prologue of this long and heroic story.
